Dude, when i hit Silver earlier this season i was being matched up with high Gold and even Plat players all because of the winning streaks i was on that allowed me to skip from b5 to s4. That's just how the game works. On the plus side, you get to improve your skills dramatically as you play against players ranks above you. It's hard, but i'm thankful for it coz now i can honestly see that i've improved alot in the past 3 months than i have in the past 2 years. Like seriously, my farming and laning phase is better now compared to last year. Just take it as a learning experience and play with an open mind.
